title: bitzizzix
author: bitzizzix
content: Actually, this is the moment of Bitcoin's current movement which is the best opportunity for all methods, because Bitcoin has provided several opportunities for those who want the price of Bitcoin to fall to make purchases, and this moment is also the best moment for those who do short-term trading. And this moment is also the best opportunity for those who do the DCA method to increase purchases because these moments are opportunities for those who should be utilized properly and THIS IS THE BEAUTY OF BITCOIN because it can benefit any method to generate short-term, medium-term, or long-term profits. And they should know that there is a lot of positive news that has occurred which is an opportunity for them that should not be missed because I am sure that even though the decline continues, Bitcoin will tend to increase and continue to increase until it passes its previous high. And the price of Bitcoin has just reached $ 108,700 which previously the price of Bitcoin had dropped to $ 90,000 in a short time.

comments.author: FortuneFollower
comments.body: Yep, saw it too.And it's great to see Bitcoin breaking ATH after ATH.We will see more dips and a correction probably afterward, but for now - we need to enjoy the fireworks and see the results of it.

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: During bullish season, people will think they're smart because they can make money in Bitcoin.I don't think that's really the beauty of Bitcoin, for me the beauty of Bitcoin is the combination of security, decentralization, pseudonymous and intangible.I have never seen an intangible asset which I have no fear to hold it for many years and no one will know I have the asset unless I expose it.

comments.author: hero_the_bossman
comments.body: Quote from: Helena Yu on January 20, 2025, 08:15:47 AMDuring bullish season, people will think they're smart because they can make money in Bitcoin.I don't think that's really the beauty of Bitcoin, for me the beauty of Bitcoin is the combination of security, decentralization, pseudonymous and intangible.I have never seen an intangible asset which I have no fear to hold it for many years and no one will know I have the asset unless I expose it.It's pseudo anonymous, but yeah, surely - it's the most secure (not privacy-wise) coin to hodl and nobody questions that, in my opinion. And it would only get better from here.

comments.author: bitzizzix
comments.body: Quote from: Helena Yu on January 20, 2025, 08:15:47 AMDuring bullish season, people will think they're smart because they can make money in Bitcoin.I don't think that's really the beauty of Bitcoin, for me the beauty of Bitcoin is the combination of security, decentralization, pseudonymous and intangible.I have never seen an intangible asset which I have no fear to hold it for many years and no one will know I have the asset unless I expose it.Yes, you are right and I know that because those things should be a priority for our assets. However, I am more showing that Bitcoin will benefit those who do the methods they do especially for the long term because I am also one of those who hold Bitcoin in the long term by doing the DCA method which always takes advantage of the declines that occur to increase my purchases that I do periodically because this is a momentum that I always take advantage of well. So I focus more on the current moment and what you mentioned, the majority of all holders will do and act like that and the beauty of Bitcoin is more than that and what I mentioned I think is one of them and also an opportunity.

comments.author: PrivacyG
comments.body: Quote from: Helena Yu on January 20, 2025, 08:15:47 AMDuring bullish season, people will think they're smart because they can make money in Bitcoin.I don't think that's really the beauty of Bitcoin, for me the beauty of Bitcoin is the combination of security, decentralization, pseudonymous and intangible.I also wish Monetary value was not the main beauty of Bitcoin for most people.  There is so much more potential and advantage it offers and people do not see it.  The Price is all they care about, completely not realizing how simple it is that they are transferring Bitcoin and receiving it with out the input of a Third Party and ignoring the actual level of simplicity in how Bitcoin works.It is fun to make Money but it is a good thing to at least look at the real value of Bitcoin every now and then.  That is when you realize how much potential it still has.

comments.author: fuguebtc
comments.body: Quote from: Helena Yu on January 20, 2025, 08:15:47 AMDuring bullish season, people will think they're smart because they can make money in Bitcoin.I don't think that's really the beauty of Bitcoin, for me the beauty of Bitcoin is the combination of security, decentralization, pseudonymous and intangible.Those who think that just because they can make profit from bitcoin and consider it the beauty of bitcoin will one day turn around and curse bitcoin because it will not increase in price forever. Sooner or later the bull season will end and the bear season will come and many people will lose money because of it. Indeed, the real beauty of bitcoin lies in its utility and use cases, not in its volatility. There is nothing wrong with taking advantage of bitcoin's volatility to make a profit but don't consider it a purely speculative tool, bitcoin has many other beauties that we should not ignore.

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: You can only appreciate the beauty of bitcoin in terms of prices if you know how to take advantage of it. Obviously, as what we say, buy low, sell high. But there are moments that you will have to question that philosophy when the price continue to go down and you are losing money and thinking of selling it already because you don't want to lose all your money. So it's not that easy to see it in the beginning, as there are a lot of ups and downs in the market and you can only acknowledge it once you go to the bull and bear market, you know how to hold, accumulate and sell at the right time. But it's good to see another all time high at $109k in the last couple of hours. And if you bought when the price is around $90k'ish, then congrats, you have made a lot of (unrealized/realized) profits already.

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: PrivacyG on January 20, 2025, 08:29:06 AMQuote from: Helena Yu on January 20, 2025, 08:15:47 AMDuring bullish season, people will think they're smart because they can make money in Bitcoin.I don't think that's really the beauty of Bitcoin, for me the beauty of Bitcoin is the combination of security, decentralization, pseudonymous and intangible.I also wish Monetary value was not the main beauty of Bitcoin for most people.  There is so much more potential and advantage it offers and people do not see it.  The Price is all they care about, completely not realizing how simple it is that they are transferring Bitcoin and receiving it with out the input of a Third Party and ignoring the actual level of simplicity in how Bitcoin works.It is fun to make Money but it is a good thing to at least look at the real value of Bitcoin every now and then.  That is when you realize how much potential it still has.Apart from the monetary benefit of Bitcoin, there are other key advantages that most people overlook. The freedom its decentralized nature gives is priceless. The government of my country enacted a policy that mandated banks to restrict bank transactions to a certain amount. Businesses began to feel the adverse impact because some of them imported goods and couldn't pay due to the restrictions. Some businesses had agreements with their international trading partners and they switched to Bitcoin as the medium of payment. The only issue I knew some of them had was prove fluctuations but they still found ways to balance their accounts. The ability bypass financial restrictions placed by Central Banks using Bitcoin is second to none.

comments.body: Quote from: Helena Yu on January 20, 2025, 08:15:47 AMi have never seen an intangible asset which I have no fear to hold it for many years and no one will know I have the asset unless I expose it.this is one beautiful thing about bitcoin that have not gotten much attention because a lot of people are just interested in seeing an investment in bitcoin of a certain amount hitting one big amount or stuff like that after they have left it hanging for a given period of time. that you could literally hold a fortune for as long as you want and no one will have the slightest idea that you are holding such amount of asset and you don't have to be afraid of government regulation or the fact that you need to pay certain amount as task is a good thing about bitcoin that makes it an asset that is worth holding.when you want consider reasons why one should hold bitcoin, you can count a lot of them and still found out that of all the available investment options, bitcoin stands as one with a unique asset that has a lot of advantages over other asset.

comments.author: jcojci
comments.body: That is if they can use this moment to accumulate more Bitcoin but most people are afraid to buy at the price now and willing to wait for more. They think that the price will go down deeper so that will be their time to buy but that will not always happen as the price is difficult to predicts accurately. Maybe they can buy for a small fraction and see the market happens and if the market still goes down for more, they can prepare some money to buy back and wait. The price will not go down without any increases so they will see when the price will reverse. The important is they can use the moment to buy Bitcoin at a low price and hold it.

comments.body: Quote from: Hyphen(-) on January 20, 2025, 02:58:55 PMWith or without positive news, Bitcoin is the best cryptocurrency that can favore al type of traders and investors.News is best weapons for Market makers to bench the market and manipulate it for their benefits. comments.author: Ziskinberg
comments.body: We'd rather be taking time and not waste the opportunity because the next time, we've all been holding and making no profit as the price declines.That is absolutely how the volatility of the market gives us an opportunity, but sad to say, some people just ignore it. We should prove to them that they are wrong and we are right in our choice by making them not fail in their expectation. We let them realize that Bitcoin can't be ignored and talk like shitcoins because this gives us a fortune that might change our lives.

comments.author: Alpha Marine
comments.body: So what happens when bitcoin dips to 50k? Will there be any beauty then or the beauty will only favour those who want to buy the dip? Don't get me wrong, I always like the profit I make from bitcoin this period, but if the beauty of bitcoin is tired to only how it gives profit and how people can buy and make profit in the short term or long term then bitcoin is no different from other assets like gold.Bitcoin is way more than just a profitable asset. Being from the kind of country I'm from where the currency can just have a freefall whenever it likes, having bitcoin as savings and not my local currency is bliss because I have a shield against inflation..Then there's the fact my government goes about freezing the accounts of those who openly oppose them. Bitcoin provides a certain sense of security for people like us.
